p: Wistar albino rats (180â€“250 g) of both sexes were selected to carry out the experiment. Four rats were taken for each group. The rats were used after an acclimatization period of 7 days to the laboratory environment. They were housed in standard metal cages and provided with food and water ad libitum. The animals were treated in accordance with the current national guidelines on animal care and use. Four groups of animals containing 4 rats in each group were anaesthetized by the open mask method with anesthetic ether.
